title: Verify: Selecting HBO NOW successfully opens the HBO NOW app
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has setup their Xbox 360 connected device
AND has added the "HBO NOW" app to their library

**NOTE: If app was installed using a dash package, the app won't appear in the Apps Library.
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects HBO NOW from the Xbox 360 Apps menu
custom_expected: THEN the HBO NOW app will open successfully

title: Verify: HBO NOW can be accessed while the Xbox 360 is connected wirelessly
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has setup their device
AND the device is currently connected to a wireless network
AND HBO NOW is installed
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects HBO NOW from the Xbox 360 Apps menu

**NOTE: If app was installed using a dash package, the app won't appear in the Apps Library.
custom_expected: THEN HBO NOW will open successfully

title: Verify: HBO NOW can be accessed while the Xbox 360 is connected using a wired connection
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has setup their device
AND the device is currently connected to a wired network connection
AND HBO NOW is installed
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects HBO NOW from the Xbox 360 Apps menu
custom_expected: THEN the HBO NOW will open successfully

title: Verify: User receives an access gate (walled garden) if they have not logged in
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has setup their device
AND the device is currently connected to an Internet connection
AND HBO NOW app is installed
AND the user has not previously accessed the app
custom_steps: WHEN the HBO NOW app is accessed
custom_expected:
THEN the user will receive an access gate
AND we will be unable to continue without first logging in (Provider/Free Trial/Current Subscriber)

title: Verify: User will NOT receive an access gate if they have previously authorized with an entitled account
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has setup their device
AND the device is currently connected to an Internet connection
AND the "HBO NOW" app is installed
AND we have already logged into the "HBO NOW" app with an entitled/subscribed account
custom_steps: WHEN we access the "HBO NOW" app from the Xbox 360 Apps menu
custom_expected:
THEN the access gate will not be encountered
AND the user will be brought to the HBO NOW Home screen

title: Verify: User will NOT receive an access gate if the logged-in ID has been authorized with an entitled account
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has setup their device
AND the device is currently connected to an Internet connection
AND the "HBO NOW" app is installed
AND the account logged in to the device is entitled with an HBO Now Subscription
custom_steps: WHEN we access the "HBO NOW" app from the Xbox 360 Apps menu
custom_expected:
THEN the access gate will not be encountered
AND the user will be brought to the HBO NOW Home screen

title: Welcome Screen: Verify access gate offers the viewer a choice Sign In with existing account (HBO Now/MVPD)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed HBO Now app
AND we have not previously logged into an account in the app
custom_steps: WHEN we select the HBO Now app icon from the Xbox 360 Apps menu
custom_expected:
THEN we are presented with the access gate (the Welcome screen)
AND there will be two options:

1.  Sign In
Take user to email/password entry screens to authenticate

2.  Purchase HBO NOW through a Provider?
Takes user to "Connect your subscription message screen; informing user to web to register account.
"Continue" button returns user back to paywall.

title: Welcome Screen: Back from access gate
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed HBO Now app
AND we have not previously logged into an account in the app
AND we have selected the HBO Now app icon 
And the app has launched to the Welcome screen
custom_steps: WHEN we press the controller [back] button
custom_expected: THEN we are returned to the the Xbox 360 Apps menu (from where the app was launched)

title: Welcome Screen: Verify text and formatting are clear, readable and adhere to the HBO Now Style Guide
custom_preconds: (Talk to PM for information pertaining to the style guide and/or the latest style guide.)
custom_expected: Welcome Screen text and formatting are clear, readable and adhere to the HBO Now Style Guide

title: Scenario: Already a  subscriber -  Sign in with entitled HBO Now account
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed HBO Now app
AND we have previously registered an HBO Now account
AND no HBO Account is signed in on the Xbox 360
AND after launch we are presented with the access gate
AND we activate "Already a subscriber? Sign in."
custom_steps:
WHEN we launch HBO Now app and are presented with the access gate
AND activate the Sign-in with my HBO NOW user information button
custom_expected:
THEN app jumps to Sign-in with HBO page
AND the keyboard presentation is as expected

title: Scenario: Login Authentication Failure and Cancel - HBO Now Sign-in
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed HBO Now app
AND we have previously registered an HBO Now account
AND no HBO Account is signed in on the device
AND we launch HBO Now app and are presented with the access gate
AND we activate "Already a subscriber? Sign in."
custom_steps:
WHEN presented with the HBO Sign-in screen
AND we activate "Sign-in with HBO Now" 
AND we enter invalid credentials (unrecognized email)
custom_expected:
THEN a Login Error Screen (or message) will appear
AND a message regarding 'Invalid email or password' will be shown
AND all formatting and text will be readable
AND activation of CANCEL will return user to HBO Sign-in page
AND activation of RETRY will return the user to enter username and password

**Note: Known fail - Won't fix - Retry does not take user to re-entry screen(s)** - https://jira.mlbam.com/browse/HBOXBOX360-443

title: Scenario: Forgot Password Page Flow
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed HBO Now app
AND we have previously registered an HBO Now account
AND no HBO Account is signed in on the device
AND we launch HBO Now app and are presented with the access gate
custom_steps:
WHEN presented with the HBO Sign-in screen
AND we enter invalid credentials (unrecognized email)
custom_expected:
THEN a Login Error Screen (or message) will appear
AND a message regarding 'Invalid email or password' will be shown
AND a message stating 'Need help signing in? Visit HBONOW.com/forgotpassword" will be shown
AND all formatting and text will be readable

![](index.php?/attachments/get/3966)

title: Scenario: Subscription Service Unavailable Registration Error with Active subscription
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed HBO Now app
AND we have previously registered an HBO Now account
AND we launch HBO Now app and are presented with the access gate
AND we select "Already a subscriber? Sign in."
custom_steps:
WHEN we Sign in with an Active MVPD subscription account but the service is unreachable

**NOTE: Need steps for making the service unreachable.
Use Fiddler 
Create rule that uses error 502
custom_expected:
THEN a Message displays with explanation text...

Please try again shortly.

title: Scenario: User that purchases HBO NOW through IAP on 'Device A (e.g. ATV)' attempts to access HBO NOW on 'Device B (Xbox 360)' by logging in with a linked account
custom_preconds: Given a user buys the application through in-app purchase on another device (or has an MVPD account)
custom_steps: When the user signs in with their linked account on a second device
custom_expected: Then upon successful login all entitled features should be unlocked

title: Subscription not Entitled: Sign In
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that the tester has an account with a Canceled Subscription (or lapsed) after a Free Trial has been used
AND HBO NOW has been downloaded to the Xbox 360 Apps menu
AND the user launches the HBO Now app
AND from the App Start Screen activates "Sign in."
custom_steps:
WHEN the user enters the un-entitled ID
example: 
xbox_expired1@hbotest.com 
HBOpassword111
custom_expected:
THEN the App displays the RENEW Subscription screen with text and selectable buttons which encourage the user to renew though hbonow.com

(Text not confirmed)
"It's time to renew.
Get unlimited access to the best of HBO: original series, hit
movies and more--for $14.99/month

See all providers at: order.hbonow.com"

¥Ë_[OK]

title: Renew Subscription - OK selection
custom_preconds:
HBO NOW has been downloaded to the Xbox 360 Apps menu 
AND user launches the HBO Now app
AND the user signs in as an HBO NOW user with a Cancelled/Expired Subscription
AND is shown the Renew Subscription Screen
custom_steps: WHEN the user activates the OK button
custom_expected: THEN the user brought to the HBO home screen but isn't able to watch any content.

title: Renew Subscription - Successful Renew via MVPD
custom_preconds:
HBO NOW has been downloaded to the Xbox 360 Apps menu 
AND user launches the HBO Now app from the Xbox 360 Apps menu 
AND the signs in as an HBO NOW user with an un-entitled Provider Subscription
AND is shown the Renew Subscription Screen
custom_steps: WHEN the user successfully completes the MVPD authentication outside of the app
custom_expected: THEN the user will be brought to the HBO NOW Home screen

title: Home: Verify when HBO Now is accessed the user lands on the Home screen (first launch)
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has installed HBO Now
custom_steps:
WHEN HBO Now is accessed from the Xbox 360 Apps menu

AND user has successfully signed in with an account that has been registered with HBO Now
AND 
a. Does not have any assets added to their Continue Watching list
b. Does have assets added to their Continue Watching list
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be brought to the Home Screen
AND the Home screen should display featured assets:

- Watchlist
- Home
- Series
- Movies
- Kids
- Comedy
- Sports 
- Documentaries
- Collections
- Late Night
- Search
- Settings

a.  AND no Continue Watching thumb hint is visible to the left
b.  AND Continue Watching thumb hint is visible to the left

AND each Menu button can be selected
AND at selection each Category type is reflected on the page 
AND at selection of Search and Settings the last Category type's images persist

![](index.php?/attachments/get/1972)

title: Home: Verify when HBO Now is accessed the user lands on the Home screen (Continue Watching ON; assets added)
custom_preconds:
The user has installed HBO Now
And signed in with valid account
And has previously selected an asset
And has started to watch the asset but not to completion before quitting the app
And has Settings: Continue Watching set to ON
custom_steps: WHEN HBO Now is accessed from the Xbox 360 Apps menu
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be brought to the Home Screen,
AND Continue Watching screen displays to the left of the Home screen with the last watched asset in the large tile.
The grid for Continue Watching is laid out from right to left, displaying a maximum of nine (9) titles: - needs confirmation
 - Medium

The Continue Watching section is the only section that exists to the left of the main navigation, and is accessible by navigating left from the top level main nav HOME option.

AND the assets are able to be scrolled through
AND the assets are selectable/playable

title: Continue Watching default On
custom_preconds:
As a user who has logged into the app before
And who has an asset in Continue Watching
custom_steps: When I launch the app I should see Continue Watching
custom_expected:
The default view is Continue Watching screen.

 - with Main Menu at right side or screen 
 - and 1st asset in list highlighted

title: Continue watching list populates from Web(OtherDevice) to Xbox 360 / REVERSE
custom_preconds: Logged into https://www.hbonow.com/ on a web browser or other connected device that has HBO Now available and the Xbox 360 on the same HBONOW account.
custom_steps:
1) On a device that has HBO Now Available separate from the Xbox 360 watch a few minutes of several shows.
2) On the Xbox 360 after launching HBO Now press left on the "Home" option on the Main Menu.
custom_expected: The user can continue watching from where they left off on the prior device.

title: Verify: Watchlist button does appear if content has not been added
custom_preconds:
Given the HBO Now channel has been accessed from the Xbox 360 Apps menu

And content has not been added to the Watchlist
custom_steps: WHEN we observe the Home screen
custom_expected:
THEN a Watchlist button is present
AND when user activates the menu option the list will display text indicating the user has not added anything to their watchlist

title: Verify: Content added to Watchlist via Add function populates Watchlist
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the HBO Now channel has been accessed from the Xbox 360 Apps menu

AND programs from 3+ items have been added to the Watchlist via the Add button from the respective content's launch pages
AND the user has noted the most recently added program
custom_steps: WHEN the Watchlist is accessed
custom_expected:
THEN the most recently added program large thumb appears in the first position
AND additional smaller program thumb hints are visible to the right 
AND all available thumbs can be selected/activated

title: Verify: Content Removed from Watchlist via Remove button in Asset Details removes program from Watchlist
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the HBO Now channel has been accessed from the Xbox 360 Apps menu

AND items have been added to the Watchlist 
AND the user notes a specific program in the Watchlist
AND the user opens the noted program's Asset Details page
custom_steps:
WHEN Remove from Watchlist button is activated
AND the Watchlist is then accessed
custom_expected: THEN the program that was removed does not appear in the Watchlist

title: Verify: Content can be removed from Watchlist
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the HBO Now channel has been accessed from the Xbox 360 Apps menu

AND content has been added to the Watchlist 
AND the Watchlist button is selected
custom_steps:
WHEN a program thumb in the Watchlist has been activated
AND the Remove From Watchlist button is activated on that content's launch page
custom_expected:
THEN the Remove button changes to an Add to Watchlist button
AND going back one screen to the Watchlist menu shows the program thumb appears with 30% Opacity to signify removal  
AND upon exiting Watchlist and returning, the program thumb is no longer present <--- NEED TO CHECK CURRENTLY DESIRED FUNCTIONALITY, AS THE 30%OPACITY THING DOESN'T HAPPEN.

title: Verify: Content can be removed from Watchlist and subsequently returned before exit
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the HBO Now app has been accessed from the XBox Apps menu

AND content has been added to the Watchlist 
AND the Watchlist button is selected
AND a program thumb in the Watchlist has been activated
AND the Remove From Watchlist button is activated on that content's launch page
custom_steps:
WHEN the user goes back one screen to the Watchlist menu 
AND observes that the program thumb appears with 30% Opacity to signify removal <--- NEED TO CHECK CURRENTLY DESIRED FUNCTIONALITY, AS THE 30%OPACITY THING DOESN'T HAPPEN.
AND activates the dimmed thumb 
AND re-adds the program to the Watchlist
custom_expected:
THEN returning to the Watchlist screen shows the program thumb appears with full Opacity 
AND upon exiting Watchlist and returning, the program thumb is still present

title: Web allows 30 displayable assets > v1.2 39+ > Verify ADD from WEB
custom_preconds: Logged into https://www.hbonow.com/ on a web browser and the Xbox 360 on the same HBONOW account.
custom_steps:
1) On pc/mac browser add up to 30 movies to the user watchlist.
2) On the Xbox 360 Navigate to the top watchlist option and see if the web added  assets appear.
custom_expected:
The Xbox 360 should display up to the first 30 items added to the Watchlist. Anything past that may not display.

Note:
When having the Xbox 360 and Web site logged in and on at the same time the user will need to exit the app or go to the search option for the HBO NOW Xbox 360 app to refresh and see the new added content.

title: Verify remove content via web/ATV/AFTV/other device reflects for Xbox 360
custom_preconds: Logged into https://www.hbonow.com/ on a web browser or other device and the Xbox 360 on the same HBONOW account.
custom_steps:
1) On pc/mac browser or other device remove items from the watchlist.
2) On the Xbox 360 Navigate to the top watchlist option and see if the web deleted assets appear.
custom_expected:
The deleted assets should not appear.

Note: The user may need to close and reopen or navigate to search and back for the Watchlist to reflect the changes.

title: Series Activated
custom_preconds: GIVEN the HBO NOW Channel has been accessed from the Xbox 360 Apps menu
custom_steps: WHEN the Series tab in the top Menu has been activated
custom_expected:
THEN the Series page is displayed including:

- Featured large tile is in the middle with 2 medium tiles on either side
- 1st Asset tile in top left position is selected
- Each of the 2 medium tiles on the left should show a different Featured Series; of the two medium tiles on the right, the top right tile says 'Family Series' and the bottom right tile says 'Series All'

title: Series Featured - Tile Navigation & Activation
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the HBO NOW Channel has been accessed from the Xbox 360 Apps menu

AND the Series tab in the top Menu has been activated
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects the Featured tile
AND navigates through the Featured Thumbs (using Right Thumbstick on controller)
custom_expected:
THEN the Featured Items are displayed as expected:

- Each Series has its own large  Thumb
- All Titles are free from graphical oddities and are clear and easy to read, containing no typos

AND each can be selected and activated

title: All Series - Tile Navigation & Activation
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the HBO NOW Channel has been accessed from the Xbox 360 Apps menu
AND the Series tab in the top Menu has been activated
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects the 'Series All' button
AND activates it
custom_expected:
THEN the All Series Items are displayed 
In Alphabetical order as expected in a 2x? grid list
AND each can be selected and activated

title: [Various] Series - Tile Navigation & Activation
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the HBO NOW Channel has been accessed from the Xbox 360 Apps menu

AND the Series tab has been activated
AND the user selects the 'Series All' button
AND the user selects the 'Filter By' button
custom_steps:
WHEN the user navigates to a variant (All, Latino or Family) of the 'Filter By' menu
AND activates it
custom_expected:
THEN the appropriate Series Items are displayed as expected in a 2x? grid list
AND each can be selected and activated

_Repeat test for each Series type, currently limited to All, Latino and Family_

title: Series Season: In-Flight Series Appearance (Multiple Seasons)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the HBO NOW Channel has been accessed from the Xbox 360 Apps menu

AND the Series tab in the top Menu has been selected
AND the user has navigated to the All Series Category
custom_steps:
WHEN the user has selected and activated a Series Thumb for a Series that:

- Has Multiple Seasons (>1)
- Is In-Flight (airing)
custom_expected:
THEN the page upon landing displays the Series Title 
AND the Latest Season is enabled <--- DOUBLE CHECK WITH PMs REGARDING CURRENT DESIRED BEHAVIOR
AND additional Season buttons are available in the 'Filter By' menu
AND the Latest Episode thumb is selected/highlighted <--- DOUBLE CHECK WITH PMs REGARDING CURRENT DESIRED BEHAVIOR
AND all appear as expected including:

- Description
- Flight Duration (Available Until)
- Runtime
- Year released
- Rating
- Video definition (if HD or better)
- Sound format (if 5.1 or better)
- Available languages 
- Watchlist Toggle
- Preview button (if available) or Restart title button (if previously viewed)
- Extras & Info button

AND the user has navigated to the All Series Category

- Has only one Season
- Is In-Flight (airing)
custom_expected:
THEN the page upon landing displays the Series Title
AND the Latest Episode thumb is selected/highlighted <--- DOUBLE CHECK WITH PMs REGARDING CURRENT DESIRED BEHAVIOR
AND the Series Selector navigation buttons are NOT shown
AND all appear as expected including:

- Description
- Flight Duration (Available Until)
- Runtime
- Year released
- Rating
- Video definition (if HD or better)
- Sound format (if 5.1 or better)
- Available languages 
- Watchlist Toggle
- Preview button (if available) or Restart title button (if previously viewed)
- Extras & Info button

title: Series Season Browse via Season Level
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has activated a Series Season button of a Series with >2 seasons
AND an Episode is auto-selected
custom_steps:
WHEN navigates up to select 'Filter By' tile
AND ensures 'All Episodes' is selected
AND then chooses Season 1
custom_expected:
THEN the user can browse Season 1 episodes only

<repeat for each available season>

title: Series Season Browse via Episode Level
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has activated a Series Season button of a Series with >2 seasons
AND an 'Filter By' has 'All Episodes' selected
custom_steps:
WHEN the user navigates to Season 1 (left if Season 1 is not already selected)
AND then navigates forward (right) through the Episodes to the most recent Episode of the current (or most current) Season
AND then navigates back (left) through to Season 1, Episode 1
custom_expected:
THEN the user can browse from Season 1 to the most current Season via each Episode
AND the user can browse back from the most recent Episode of the most current Season to Season 1, Episode 1
AND the Season Level buttons show enabled states for each associated Season, matching the Episode's expected Season

title: Series Episode Appearance - Episodes Viewed vs. Not Viewed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has accessed a Series Season
AND has has viewed <50% of only 2 Episodes of the Season and noted their titles
custom_steps:
WHEN the user observes the Episode Pages noted in Step 2
AND observes the Episode Pages that have not been viewed
custom_expected:
THEN a progress bar for the viewed Episodes correctly displays the expected progress position for each
AND the Episodes in the Season that have not been viewed do not display a progress bar

title: Series Episode Appearance - Viewed - App exit and return
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has accessed a Series Season
AND views viewed <50% of 2 Episodes and noted their titles
AND the user has powered down their Xbox 360
AND user has relaunched HBO NOW and returned via any path to the same Season Series Episode Pages noted in step 2
custom_steps: WHEN the user observes the noted Season Series Episode Pages
custom_expected: THEN the progress bar for the correctly displays the expected progress for each Episode

title: Series Episode: Appearance - Episode Completed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has accessed a Series Season Page
AND has activated an Episode button, launched said Episode and watched it to completion 
AND the next Episode has begun to play 
AND the user returns to the Season Series Pages via BACK button
custom_steps: WHEN the user observes the same Season Episode Page
custom_expected:
THEN the most recently viewed Episode appears in the list queue without a progress bar 
AND launch starts the episode from the beginning

title: Verify: Extras & Info
custom_preconds:

AND the user has navigated to any Series Episode thumb
AND the thumb for the program has been activated
custom_steps: WHEN the Extras & Info button is activated
custom_expected:

 - Title
 - Special Feature Video thumbs (if available)
 - Information on Cast, Crew, Music and other credits (information varies)

AND Special Feature Video thumbs can be launched to play back video
AND Information can be navigated through to view all

_Note: Mark as Pass only after testing multiple pages and including pages that include Video._

And the Search menu has been activated
And a search query has returned valid results
custom_steps: When using controller down to navigating to results
custom_expected: Focus shifts from alphabet at top of screen to search results below, with the 1st results (top left most asset) in focus.

custom_expected: The asset detail page for the selected movie opens up

title: Results: Verify that backing out of the Movie Launch page via the BACK button returns the app to the Search results screen
custom_preconds:
Given that the HBO Now channel has been accessed from the Xbox 360 Apps menu

And the Search menu has been activated
And a valid search query has returned results grouped in the Movie category
And a Movie search result has been activated taking the app to the Movie asset detail page

custom_expected:
The app goes back to the previous Search Results page
And the search query results remain present onscreen
And the a movie result is highlighted.

custom_preconds:

title: Video Player UI - Appearance and Timeout
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed HBO NOW
AND we have accessed the Channel from the Xbox 360 Apps menu
custom_steps:
WHEN we launch a video feed
AND wait for Title to fade and video to playback
AND we tap down on the D-pad/Remote button down

_Down, Right and Left all yield same result in this test, Up is disabled_
custom_expected:
THEN the Play Controls and Program Title overlay the video playback 
AND after 4 seconds they disappear
AND tapping D-Pad button (D/R/L) again will reveal Play Controls and Program Title overlay
AND after 4 seconds they disappear

title: MAIN MENU: moving into categories (category to subcategory)
custom_preconds:
The user has installed HBO Now
And signed in with valid account
custom_steps:
At Home Main Menu select a category:


Watchlist (if user has watchlist items)

Home
Series
Movies
Kids
Comedy
Sports
Documentaries
Collections
Late Night

Search
Settings
custom_expected:
Current Menu UI: moves out of view to the left 
Destination Menu UI: moves into view from the right 

Destination Breadcrumb Label: fades into view 

Parent Breadcrumb*: changes from white to gray

 * if present
---
The traversal of the Main Menu￾ UI (to and from Category and Subcategory) should animate in a manner that implies that Main Menu, Category, and Subcategory exist on a 2D plane, ordered from left-to-right.



NOTE:  The Search and Settings option activation from the Main Menu uses a default transition (fade in/out) and in not treated as on the same 2D plane as the categories.

title: MENU: moving out of categories (subcategory to category)
custom_preconds:
The user has installed HBO Now
And signed in with valid account
And have navigated into a Category:

Watchlist (if user has watchlist items)

Home
Series
Movies
Kids
Comedy
Sports
Documentaries
Collections
Late Night

Search
Settings
custom_steps: At Subcategory menu, press left d-pad and observe
custom_expected:
Current Menu UI: moves out of view to the right 
Destination Menu UI: moves into view from the left 

Destination Breadcrumb Label: changes from gray to white 
Current Breadcrumb Label*: Fades out of view

 * if present
---
The traversal of the Main Menu￾ UI (to and from Category and Subcategory) should animate in a manner that implies that Main Menu, Category, and Subcategory exist on a 2D plane, ordered from left-to-right.

title: MAIN MENU: Scrolling through categories- moving Down through the menu
custom_preconds:
The user has installed HBO Now
And signed in with valid account
And is at the Home Main menu
With any menu item except the last (Settings) in focus
custom_steps: Press down on d-pad and observe
custom_expected:
Focus State (White text offset from the magic margin by 16 pixels, accompanied by a blue pipe) shifts down to the next element in the Main Menu UI

Current Grid: moves up, fades out of view 
Destination Grid: moves up, fades into view

-------
While moving up and down within a given category, the grid should also animate in a manner that suggests that each section exists above and below each
other on a 2D plane.

![](index.php?/attachments/get/1116)

title: MAIN MENU: Scrolling through categories- moving Up through the menu
custom_preconds:
The user has installed HBO Now
And signed in with valid account
And is at the Home Main menu
custom_steps: At Main menu with any menu item in focus except the first, press up on d-pad and observe
custom_expected:
Focus State (White text offset from the magic margin by 16 pixels, accompanied by a blue pipe) shifts up to the next element in the Main Menu UI
Current Grid: moves down, fades out of view 
Destination Grid: moves down, fades into view

-------
While moving up and down within a given category, the grid should also animate in a manner that suggests that each section exists above and below each
other on a 2D plane.

![](index.php?/attachments/get/1116)

title: ASSET DETAIL: Transition from Asset Detail to Extras & Info
custom_preconds:
The user has installed HBO Now
And signed in with valid account
And has navigated to an Asset Detail page
And the Asset has "Extras & Info" available
custom_steps: Select the EXTRAS & INFO button and observe
custom_expected:
Series / Feature Title: stays in place
Sn N / Ep N designation*: moves up into view (With a prepended colon, and rests in-line with Series Title) 
Asset Details: move up and off-screen
Extras & Info: move up from off-screen


     *Series only

-------

The purpose of this animation is to convey to the user that the Extras & Info￾ content for a given property are located beneath￾ its Asset Detail Page. 
This transition should ONLY be implemented when navigating between an Extras & Info section and back to its parent Asset.

Transitions between Extras & Info and any other pages should fall back to the default fade-in/fade-out animation described above.
![](index.php?/attachments/get/1125)

title: ASSET DETAIL: Transition from Extras & Info to Asset Detail
custom_preconds:
The user has installed HBO Now
And signed in with valid account
And has navigated to an Asset Detail page
And the Asset has "Extras & Info" available
custom_steps:
Select the EXTRAS & INFO button; Extras & Info comes onto screen.
Press the back button on controller
custom_expected:
Series / Feature Title: stays in place
Sn N / Ep N designation*: moves down and off-screen 
Asset Details: move down and into view
Extras & Info: move down and off-screen


     *Series only

-------

The purpose of this animation is to convey to the user that the Extras & Info￾ content for a given property are located beneath￾ its Asset Detail Page. 
This transition should ONLY be implemented when navigating between an Extras & Info section and back to its parent Asset.

Transitions between Extras & Info and any other pages should fall back to the default fade-in/fade-out animation described above.
![](index.php?/attachments/get/1125)

title: Tile & Progress Indicators: transition from Idle to Focus state
custom_expected:
Full Bleed Image focus:
--- 
Image size increases by 10% 
Image & Title opacity increases to 100% 
Title displays blue pipe and rating


Large/Medium/Small tiles
---
Image size increases by 10% inside of the idle size tile 
Image & Title opacity increases to 100% 
Blue border around the tile and the rating is present
*Progress indicator doubles in height

*only for items which have been previously watched but not completed

title: Tile & Progress Indicators: transition from Focus to Idle state
custom_expected:
Full Bleed Image Idle:
--- 
Image size reduces by 10% 
Image & Title opacity decreases to 80% (need confirmation)
Title does not displays blue pipe and rating


Large/Medium/Small tiles
---
Image size decreases by 10% while maintaining the focus sized tile 
Image & Title opacity decreases to 80% (need confirmation)
NO Blue border around the tile and the rating is NOT present
*Progress indicator reduces in height by half

*only for items which have been previously watched but not completed

title: Default Page Transitions
custom_preconds:
Pages that are subject to custom animations, are done so primarily to communicate a sense of physical äóìlocationäó￾ to the user, thereby making content traversal via directional input a more intuitive experience.

Pages that are not subject to custom animations should use default animations to fade in and out of pages and NEVER appear to blink on or off screen.
custom_steps:
Navigating the following page transitions: 

 - FireTV Home to HBO Now app Start-up
 - Main Menu to Search
 - Search to Main Menu
 - Main Menu to Settings
 - Settings to Main Menu
 - Subcategory to Asset Detail
 - Asset Detail to Subcategory
 - Asset Detail to Video player
 - Video playback to Asset Detail
custom_expected:
Default transition between pages should be a fade-in/fadeout scenario. 
There is no expectation for motion to be present in default transitions, however it's expected that deliberate control over the position, duration and curve specifications for each view element (title, season nav, asset details, etc) will be appl

title: Video Transport: Focus transition to Captions
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed HBO NOW
AND we have accessed the Channel from the Xbox 360 Apps menu
AND have launched a video feed
And video transport controls are displayed on screen with the focus state (Blue circle) on the Play button above the timeline
custom_steps:
When we press down d-pad to access the *Closed Captioning options

     *Latino assets with alternate caption options display as: LANGUAGE-(English/Espaí±ol)
custom_expected:
Focus State shifts down to below the timeline to Closed Captions and the CC options display beside the CC icon.

Current focus (Timeline and transport UI): moves up to allow space for the closed caption text and options.
Destination focus: fades into view

While moving up and down within the video transport UI, the controls/timeline should animate in a manner that suggests that each section exists above and below each
other on a 2D plane.

title: Video Transport: Focus transition from Captions to player control(s)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed HBO NOW
AND we have accessed the Channel from the Xbox 360 Apps menu
AND have launched a video feed
And video transport controls are displayed on screen with the focus state on Closed Caption options below the timeline
custom_steps:
When we press up d-pad to exit the *Closed Captioning options and return to player controls

     *Latino assets with alternate caption options display as: LANGUAGE-(English/Espaí±ol)
custom_expected:
Focus State shifts up to above the timeline to the Play button and the CC options fade off screen beside the CC icon.

Current focus: Closed Captions fade out of view
Destination focus (Timeline and transport UI): moves down into the space where the closed caption text and options were displayed and the Play button gains focus (blue circle)

While moving up and down within the video transport UI, the controls/timeline should animate in a manner that suggests that each section exists above and below each
other on a 2D plane.

title: Wired Connection: Launch and playback
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have the Xbox 360 connected to a wired network connection
AND we have installed HBO NOW
AND we have accessed the Channel from the Xbox 360 Apps menu
custom_steps:
WHEN we locate a video feed
AND we attempt to play this
custom_expected:
THEN the video stream will launch successfully
AND the feed will play without issue

title: Wireless Connection: Launch and playback
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have the Xbox 360 connected to a wired network connection
AND we have installed HBO NOW
AND we have accessed the Channel from the Xbox 360 Apps menu
custom_steps:
WHEN we locate a video feed
AND we attempt to play this
custom_expected:
THEN the video stream will launch successfully
AND the feed will play without issue

title: Launch to Fullscreen - First View
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have the Xbox 360 connected to a wired network connection
AND we have installed HBO NOW
AND we have accessed the Channel from the Xbox 360 Apps menu
custom_steps:
WHEN we locate a video feed we have not yet viewed
AND we attempt to play this
custom_expected:
THEN the video playback will launch
AND the playback will be full screen

title: Launch to Fullscreen - Previously Viewed - Resume
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have the Xbox 360 connected to a wired network connection
AND we have installed HBO NOW
AND we have accessed the Channel from the Xbox 360 Apps menu
AND we have previously viewed a portion of a specific video feed and noted it
AND we have noted the exit point
custom_steps:
WHEN we locate the noted video feed we have previously viewed
AND we attempt to play this
custom_expected:
THEN playback will resume from the expected position in the program
AND the playback will be full screen

title: Launch to Fullscreen - Previously Viewed - From Beginning
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have the Xbox 360 connected to a network 
AND we have installed HBO NOW
AND we have accessed the Channel from the Xbox 360 Apps menu
AND we have previously viewed a portion of a specific video feed and noted it
AND we have noted the exit point
custom_steps:
WHEN we locate the noted video feed we have previously viewed
AND we attempt to play this via Restart button
custom_expected:
THEN playback will launch from the beginning of the program
AND the playback will be full screen

title: Full Linear Playback to Exit
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed HBO NOW
AND we have accessed the Channel from the Xbox 360 Apps menu
custom_steps:
WHEN we launch a video feed with a TRT > 60mins
AND watch to completion
custom_expected:
THEN playback will commence and continue without stalls or skips
AND the user will not be kicked out of the stream unexpectedly
AND upon completion the app will return to launch (asset) page

title: Play/Pause Appearance
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed HBO NOW
AND we have accessed the Channel from the Xbox 360 Apps menu
custom_steps:
WHEN we launch a video feed
AND wait for Title to fade and program video to play
AND we tap down on the D-pad***

*** _Down, Right and Left all yield same result in this test, Up is disabled_
custom_expected:
THEN the Play Controls and Program Title*** overlay the video playback (Pause Icon seen)
AND when we press Play/Pause we note the following:

- PAUSE icon becomes a PLAY icon
- Title*** appears in top/left area
- Time elapsed appears on left side of Timeline
- Playhead position is shown in the Timeline
- Total Run Time appears on left side of Timeline
- Closed Captioning Icon appears below the Timeline

![](index.php?/attachments/get/1110)

*** _In the event of a series, the series title remains, and the episode title appears beneath it_

title: Pause/Play
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed HBO NOW
AND we have accessed the Channel from the Xbox 360 Apps menu
custom_steps:
WHEN we launch a video feed
AND we press the Xbox 360 controller's Play/Pause button
custom_expected:
THEN the UI and all expected elements will appear including a PLAY icon
AND the pause can be held indefinitely 
AND at a second press of the Xbox 360 controller's Play/Pause button the UI will fade/exit screen
AND playback will resume as expected

title: Transport Controls - FWD Functionality
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed HBO NOW
AND we have accessed the Channel from the Xbox 360 Apps menu
AND we launch a video feed
AND playback of the video feed has commenced (beyond any bumpers or loading)
custom_steps:
WHEN tap the FFWD button on the Xbox 360's controller 1x
AND observe
AND then tap the FFWD button on the Xbox 360's controller an additional 3x
AND observe
AND we tap the FFWD button on the Xbox 360's controller an additional 2x
AND observe
AND then we tap ENTER before the end of the program
custom_expected:
THEN the UI will appear as expected with the Flipbook/Filmstrip 
AND at each FFWD tap the speed will increase 
AND an additional arrow will appear in the Flipbook UI to indicate increasing speed for 4 total FFWD taps
AND additional 2 FFWD taps do not effect the app
AND at ENTER the app jumps to the expected position in the video feed
AND playback resumes as expected

title: Seek FWD to Exit
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed HBO NOW
AND we have accessed the Channel from the Xbox 360 Apps menu
custom_steps:
WHEN we launch a non-Series video feed
AND seek to tail of program's Timeline
AND we press ENTER to jump
custom_expected: THEN the app will transition from playback and return to launch (asset) page gracefully

title: Transport Controls - RWD Functionality
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed HBO NOW
AND we have accessed the Channel from the Xbox 360 Apps menu
AND we launch a video feed with a TRT > 60 mins
AND playback of the video feed has commenced (beyond any bumpers or loading)
AND we FFWD 60 minutes into the video feed
AND resume normal playback
custom_steps:
WHEN tap the RWD button on the Xbox 360's controller 1x
AND observe
AND then tap the RWD button on the Xbox 360's controller an additional 3x
AND observe
AND we tap the RWD button on the Xbox 360's controller an additional 2x
AND observe
AND then we tap ENTER before the head of the program
custom_expected:
THEN the UI will appear as expected with the Trickplay
AND at each RWD tap the speed will increase forward through the video feed
AND an additional arrow will appear in the Flipbook UI to indicate increasing speed for 4 total RWD taps
AND additional 2 RWD taps do not effect the app
AND at ENTER the app jumps to the expected position in the video feed
AND playback resumes as expected

title: Seek BACK (RWD) to Head of Program
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed HBO NOW
AND we have accessed the Channel from the Xbox 360 Apps menu
custom_steps:
WHEN we launch a video feed
AND seek FWD > 10 mins into program
AND allow > 30 secs of playback
AND seek BACK (RWD) to head of program
AND press ENTER to jump to head of program
custom_expected: THEN the app will resume playback from beginning and continue without issue

title: Verify: Closed Captions Display - OFF to ON
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed HBO NOW
AND we have accessed the Channel from the Xbox 360 Apps menu
AND we have noted our Caption Style Settings (See Settings/Closed Captioning Section)
AND subtitles are set to OFF in Settings (See [C53115])
AND have launched a video feed
custom_steps:
WHEN tap down 2x on the Xbox 360 controller's D-pad button
AND enable the Closed Captioning ON button
custom_expected:
THEN playback is paused during Closed Captioning button navigation
AND we see subtitles appearing as expected at return to playback via PLAY button or up from PLAY button via D-pad

_Repeat test 10+ times spot checking variances on CC styles before giving a PASS_

title: Verify: Closed Captions Display - ON to OFF
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed HBO NOW
AND we have accessed the Channel from the Xbox 360 Apps menu
AND subtitles are set to ON in Settings (See [C53115])
AND have launched a video feed
AND have confirmed the appearance of CCs
custom_steps:
WHEN tap down 2x on the Xbox 360 controller's D-pad button
AND enable the Closed Captioning OFF button
custom_expected:
THEN playback is paused during Closed Captioning button navigation
AND we see subtitles no longer appear at return to playback via PLAY button or up from PLAY button via D-pad

title: Series/Episodes Play to credits: Auto-play Next Episode via Countdown
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed HBO NOW
AND we have accessed the Channel from the Xbox 360 Apps menu
custom_steps:
WHEN we launch a Series Episode that has at least one additional Next Episode in the current or next Season
AND we have watched to the Credits
And 5 seconds of Credits have played
custom_expected:
THEN we are presented with the partial Drawer view at the bottom of the screen:
![](index.php?/attachments/get/1108)

AND a Countdown Timer appears
AND at the end of the countdown the Next Episode is launched

title: Series/Episodes Play to credits: Auto-play Next Episode at end of Program
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed HBO NOW
AND we have accessed the Channel from the Xbox 360 Apps menu
custom_steps:
WHEN we launch a Series Episode that has at least one additional Next Episode in the Season
AND we have watched to the Credits
AND 5 seconds of Credits have played
AND we are presented with the partial Drawer view at the bottom of the screen
AND the Countdown Timer appears
AND we interact with UI via up on D-pad*

_*any interaction disables countdown_
custom_expected:
THEN the Countdown & Drawer are dismissed
AND when the video plays to completion the Next Episode is launched

title: Series/Episodes Play to credits: Auto-play Next Episode at end of Program via FFWD
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed HBO NOW
AND we have accessed the Channel from the Xbox 360 Apps menu
custom_steps:
WHEN we launch a Series Episode that has at least one additional Next Episode in the Season
AND we FFWD to the end of the program's Timeline
AND we press ENTER to jump to the end
custom_expected: THEN the Next Episode is launched

title: Series/Episodes Play to credits: Launch Next Episode via Drawer
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed HBO NOW
AND we have accessed the Channel from the Xbox 360 Apps menu
custom_steps:
WHEN we launch a Series Episode that has at least one additional Next Episode in the Season
AND we have watched to the Credits
AND 5 seconds of Credits have played
AND we are presented with the Drawer at the bottom of the screen
AND the Countdown Timer appears
AND we interact with UI via down on D-pad
custom_expected:
THEN the countdown timer stops
AND we are presented with the full Drawer View:
![](index.php?/attachments/get/1109)

AND activation of the Next Episode launches the associated Episode

title: Series/Episodes Play to credits: Launch Extra Program via Drawer
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed HBO NOW
AND we have accessed the Channel from the Xbox 360 Apps menu
custom_steps:
WHEN we launch a Series Episode that has at least one additional Next Episode in the Season
AND we have watched to the Credits
AND 5 seconds of Credits have played
AND we are presented with the Drawer at the bottom of the screen
AND the Countdown Timer appears
AND we interact with UI via down on D-pad
custom_expected:
THEN the countdown is stopped
AND we are presented with the full Drawer View:
![](index.php?/attachments/get/1109)

AND activation of an Extras Program launches the associated video
AND after completion app jumps to Extras details page

title: Network: Verify bandwidth/stream quality degrades with restrictive network connection
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that the Xbox 360 device is connected to a Network Proxy Tool
AND the user has set up a fluctuating bandwidth rule
custom_steps:
WHEN the HBO Now channel has been accessed from the Xbox 360 Apps menu
AND a valid HBO Now account is linked to the app
IF playback of an asset has been initiated
custom_expected: THEN playback bitrate fluctuates until "settling" on the minimum supported stream

title: Network: Verify video quality improves with connectivity improvement
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that the Xbox 360 device is connected to a Network Proxy Tool
AND the user has set up and enabled a restrictive bandwidth rule
custom_steps:
WHEN the HBO Now channel has been accessed from the Xbox 360 Apps menu
AND a valid HBO Now account is linked to the app
AND playback of an asset has been initiated
IF the restrictive bandwidth rule is disabled
custom_expected: THEN playback returns to the highest supported bitrate allowed by the user's internet connection

title: Network: Verify the following bandwidth connection
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that the Xbox 360 device is connected to a Network Proxy Tool
AND the user has set up and enabled a restrictive bandwidth rule
custom_steps:
WHEN the HBO Now channel has been accessed from the Xbox 360 Apps menu
AND a valid HBO Now account is linked to the app
AND playback of an asset has been initiated
custom_expected:
Verify playback and bitrate switching on the following connection speeds:

- 10 MBPS
- 5 MBPS
- 3 MBPS (minimum supported connection)
- 1.5 MBPS
- >1MBPS

title: DRM: With HDCP turned on and the user tries to record, then the app should stop the user from getting a clean feed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has the HDCP turned on
AND the HBO app is open with valid credentials
AND the user has hooked up a recording device
custom_steps: WHEN the user attempts to watch and record a video feed
custom_expected: THEN the video feed blanks to a blue screen or a screen that the user is unable to record a clean video.

title: DRM: Video feed upscales to HD after a few seconds of checking for recording devices
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the HBO App has launched
AND the user has entered valid Credentials
custom_steps: WHEN the user enters a video feed
custom_expected:
THEN the video feed starts out in SD to check for recording devices
BUT after a few seconds have elapsed and there isn't a recording device, then the video jumps back to HD
